A.text: The Local CTE Advisory Committee is operational and reflects the committee membership as outlined in the California Education Code ยง8070 and meets at least once a year.

B.text: Business/industry is involved in student learning activities.

C.text: Business/industry is involved in the development and validation of the curriculum.
evidence: List of Advisory Members and Industries

D.text: Labor market demand has been documented for the Program.

E.text: There are industry certification standards and certificates for students who achieve industry recognized skill and knowledge requirements.
